version_description:
New brushes - Oil, Chisel, Chisel Radial, Fill Stretch, Line Radial, Line Corner, Fill Lasso
New Favorites toolbar, press heart button to pin a tool to the top bar.
New texture system - most brushes now support textures
New Tools inventory - all tools accessed with + button
Auto Pick Color mode - press E twice for auto color pick
Transparent Export - export .png with transparency
UI Scale - user can set custom UI scale in options

Gesture Zoom and Pan
Aspect Ratios
Canvas Resizing (pixel art to high resolution and back with no degradation)
Improved Stats
Flip Canvas (Command F)
Improved Black and White mode
Improved UI scaling on High DPI devices
Lots of UI polish
Many Bugfixes

Dark Mode,
Improved UI visibility and polish,
Line Gradient Bugfix,
Pinch Zoom and Scale Bugfix

Smudge and blur mode
Fixes canvas size bug
Two finger undo gesture
Improved Palm Rejection
Improved Color Box Picker usability and visibility
Lots of UI polish
Lots of bugfixes

Warning, Export Old paintings before updating app, new smudge produces different results
